content.question: Do you have your marriage certificate?
content.originalCertificate: This must be your original marriage certificate or a certified copy. You can't use a photocopy.
content.court: You'll need to post this to the court with your printed application.

checkYourAnswersContent.question: Do you have your marriage certificate?

content.question: A yw eich tystysgrif priodas yn eich meddiant?
content.originalCertificate: Rhaid mai eich tystysgrif priodas wreiddiol yw hon neu gopi swyddogol ohoni Copi ardystiedig. Ni ellir defnyddio llungopi.
content.court: Bydd angen ichi bostio hon i’r llys gyda’ch cais.

checkYourAnswersContent.question: A yw eich tystysgrif priodas yn eich meddiant?
